avail.title: 5th Revised Ultimate History of Network Radio Programming and Guide to ALL Circulating Shows, The
avail.author: Hickerson, Jay

infos.info: Dunning lists the 1941 show as airing Saturdays at 10 a.m. until July, then at 11 a.m. Lionel Stander is cast as J. Riley Farnsworth, Grace Coppin as Maude, Jackie Grimes as Davie, Peggy Conklin as Peggy. - Jackson Wheeler and George Bryan are listed as announcers, Leonard Bercovici as director, Sidney Harmon as writer. - In the 1944-1951 show Dunning also lists Lou Kosloff as orchestra leader, Dick Powell as one of the writers, and Monty Fraser on sound effects.
